languages.text: “嗯……或许咱们可以一边喝点酒，一边愉快地交谈一番？”
languages.original_text: "Mmm... perhaps we could make do with some pleasant conversation over a few glasses of wine?"

traits.locale_text: “嗯……或许咱们可以一边喝点酒，一边愉快地交谈一番？”

languages.text: 「そうだな…何杯かワインでも飲みながら、楽しい会話を続けないか？」
languages.original_text: "Mmm... perhaps we could make do with some pleasant conversation over a few glasses of wine?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな…何杯かワインでも飲みながら、楽しい会話を続けないか？」

languages.text: «Mmm... ¿te apetecería una conversación acompañada de buen vino?».
languages.original_text: "Mmm... perhaps we could make do with some pleasant conversation over a few glasses of wine?"

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... ¿te apetecería una conversación acompañada de buen vino?».

languages.text: « Hmm... Et si nous nous contentions plutôt de bavarder gentiment autour d'une bonne bouteille de vin ? »
languages.original_text: "Mmm... perhaps we could make do with some pleasant conversation over a few glasses of wine?"

languages.text: "Hmm ... könnten wir uns nicht vielleicht bei ein paar Gläsern Wein ganz in Ruhe unterhalten?"
